Orca Transport Mechanisms

There are currently three Orca Transport mechanisms. A transport mechanism provides an implementation for the patterns, as required by the components at compilation time.

CORBA

CORBA transport uses the ACE/TAO Orb for communication, and the centralised Corba Naming Service.

CRUD

CRUD is a light-weight transport mechanism written by Matt Ridley. It is based on UDP and shared-memory.

SOCKET

SOCKET is a light-weight TCP-based transport mechanism.
